casebody.data:
LAW OFFICES OF PETER H. PRIEST, PLLC
v.
Gabriel COCH and Information Patterns, LLC. No. 421P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. John Walter Bryant, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Law Offices Of Peter H. Priest, PLLC. Carlos E. Mahoney, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Coch, Gabriel, et al. Amber J. Ivie, Attorney at Law, for Law Offices of Peter H. Priest, PLLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th of December 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
